name: immich-frame
description: ImmichFrame turns a device into a digital photo frame powered by Immich. It displays selected albums or recent uploads in a slideshow style UI, ideal for wall mounted tablets or always on screens showing your self hosted photo library.
features: Digital Frame Mode: Transform tablets or displays into beautiful digital photo frames.
Slideshow Display: Automatically cycle through photos with customizable transition effects.
Album Selection: Choose specific Immich albums to display on each frame.
Recent Photos: Show latest uploads for a constantly refreshed display.
Fullscreen Mode: Distraction-free photo viewing optimized for wall-mounted displays.
Customizable Timing: Control how long each photo displays before transitioning.
Immich Integration: Pull photos directly from your Immich library in real-time.
Always-On Display: Designed for continuous operation on dedicated screens.
